name: Gift from Virgo
content: I wish I could look in your eyes
我多希望能看着你的双眼
And tell you how I feel
就现在 在你的内心
Baby I know that it's real
宝贝 我知道这是真的
So real so real so real
How I wish I could be with you
How I wish I wish I wish I
Could be with you right now
我不在乎我们是去公园还是去看戏
Stay in the hotel room all day
或是在宾馆里待一整天
I just wanna be with you
From your old school tennis shoes
昔日你上学时的网球鞋
Do you remember our first kiss
还记得我们第一次接吻吗
When it's time for me to leave
我从来都不想与你别离
总有一天我们会再亲热
